DataSource.Query: WITH sales AS ( SELECT transaction_view.item_id, transaction_view.quantity, transaction_view.price, transaction_view.quantity * transaction_view.price AS amount FROM inventory.transaction_view JOIN sales.sales ON transaction_view.checkout_id = sales.checkout_id WHERE transaction_view.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date ), purchase AS ( SELECT transaction_view.item_id, transaction_view.quantity, transaction_view.quantity * transaction_view.price AS amount FROM inventory.transaction_view JOIN purchase.purchases ON transaction_view.checkout_id = purchases.checkout_id WHERE transaction_view.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date ), report AS ( SELECT sales.item_id, ROUND(SUM(sales.quantity),2) AS sales_qty, ROUND(SUM(sales.amount) / SUM(sales.quantity),2) AS sales_price, ROUND(SUM(sales.amount),2) AS sales_amount, ROUND(SUM(purchase.amount) / SUM(purchase.quantity),2) AS purchase_price FROM purchase JOIN sales ON purchase.item_id = sales.item_id GROUP BY sales.item_id ), profit AS ( SELECT *, ROUND(report.sales_qty * purchase_price, 2) purchase_amount, report.sales_price - report.purchase_price AS profit_price, sales_amount - ROUND(report.sales_qty * purchase_price, 2) AS profit_amount FROM report ) SELECT item_id, inventory.get_item_name_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_name, sales_qty, sales_price, sales_amount, purchase_price, purchase_amount, profit_price, profit_amount, ROUND((profit_price / sales_price) * 100, 2) AS profit_ratio FROM profit ORDER BY 10 DESC;
